thread.section_title: Pangea Real Estate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pangea Real Estate | www.pangeare.com
thread.title: Pamela Fairchild
thread.title_full: Pangea Real Estate reviewed by Pamela Fairchild

author: Pamela Fairchild
title: Pamela Fairchild
text: To start off I was ready for a change of scenery. So I wanted to move from the Southside to the Westside of town. I checked out Pangaea's website and they had so many places to choose from. I called and scheduled a showing. And when I met with the real estate agent Yolanda C she was very nice and helpful. And she answered all my questions that I had. And to top it off. I loved the apartment I looked at instantly and wanted to apply for it. The next day I was approved and I was able to get in for the lease signing. And also the lady I met with at the office Shainna was very nice and professional. And was able to answer any questions that I had. The staff was just awesome and I would definitely refer others to this Real Estate company.
